name: Scientific religion
uniques: May buy [Science] buildings with [Faith] for [3] times their normal Production cost

name: Sacred production
uniques: May buy [Production] buildings with [Faith] for [3] times their normal Production cost

name: Goddess of games
uniques: May buy [Happiness] buildings with [Faith] for [2] times their normal Production cost

name: God of lovers
uniques: [5]% growth [in all cities]
[10]% growth [in capital]

name: God of travel
uniques: All newly-trained [non-air] units [in all cities] receive the [Blessing of Hermes] promotion

name: Goddess of Commerce
uniques: [+1 Gold] from [All Road] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Faith] from [All Road] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Production] from [Railroad] tiles [in all cities]

name: Worker Icon
uniques: Can build [All] improvements at a [80]% rate
May buy [Worker] units with [Faith] for [2] times their normal Production cost
May buy [Work Boats] units with [Faith] for [1] times their normal Production cost

name: Cult of power
uniques: Provides [6] [Divine power]

name: Religious tyranny
uniques: [-1 Happiness, +1 Gold, +1 Faith, +1 Production, +1 Food] per [1] population [in all cities]
[-1 Happiness, +2 Gold, +1 Faith, +2 Food] per [1] population [in capital]

name: Slow but better
uniques: [-33]% [Faith] [in all cities]
May choose [1] additional [Founder] beliefs when [founding] a religion
May choose [1] additional [Follower] beliefs when [enhancing] a religion

name: Closer to the deities
uniques: May buy [Divine Tower] buildings with [Faith] [in cities following this religion]

name: Asceticism
uniques: [+1 Happiness] from every [Shrine] <in cities with at least [3] [Followers of this Religion]>

name: Ceremonial Burial
uniques: [+1 Happiness] for each global city following this religion

name: Holy Order
uniques: [Faith] cost of purchasing [Missionary] units [-30]%
[Faith] cost of purchasing [Inquisitor] units [-30]%
